channel.title: [RS2] Need 317 Insight and Programming Help
channel.description:
I strayed away from programming to peruse aviation but I had an idea which takes me back to programming but I have [u][i][b]no[/b][/i][/u] idea how to go about doing this.
I am unfamiliar with how exactly the 317 cache is packed, what creates the map, file types, editing those files, unpacking cached data, loading objects, etc... I would love to know more about this (in depth) and my goal/idea is to wipe the RuneScape map and replace it with a map of my own creation using the same methods already being used. I know its been done before, but I have a thirst for knowledge. Any information at all will be appreciated.

item.title: [RS2] Need 317 Insight and Programming Help
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:6, topic:546948”]I could teach you but the will is not there right now. Or ever. Maybe tomorrow. Or next week.[/quote]Perhaps post a voice recording or however you’re doing it on the forums?

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2] Need 317 Insight and Programming Help
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Some code snippets would be nice if able. For example:

[ul][li]Loading Map Data[/li]
[li]Loading Object Data[/li]
[li]Creating the Loaded Map and Objects[/li]
[li]How to Properly Edit Parts of the Cache[/li][/ul]

I know someone here can teach me

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2] Need 317 Insight and Programming Help
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

For the 317 cache you are better off looking into an open source server. Apollo has a pretty nice read-only api, and from there you can figure out how to write valid files into the cache, or find something that supports read and write.

Read full topic
